ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Get out! you are accursed!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He said: “Get out of here; surely you are accursed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Lord said, "Get out of here. You deserve to be stoned!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Therefore exit from heaven, for you have been outcast.” (To disrespect the Prophets – peace and blessings be upon them – is blasphemy.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Allah) said: "Then get out from here; for verily, you are outcast."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Then get out of it, for surely you are driven away:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said He, 'Then go thou forth hence; thou art accursed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Go forth from hence, for lo! thou art outcast,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah said: get thee forth therefrom verify thou art driven away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Begone hence, for you are indeed an outcast,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Allah) said: "Then get thee out from here: for thou art rejected, accursed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Allah) said: "Then get out from here, for verily, you are outcast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Then get out of here! You are an outcast!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Allah] said, "Then get out of Paradise, for indeed, you are expelled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:77] He said, ‘Then begone hence, that is, from Paradise — or, it is said, [begone] from the heavens — for you are indeed accursed, outcast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Allah said to him: (Go forth from hence) leave the angelic form; and it is also said this means: leave the earth, (for lo! thou art outcast) you are accursed and banished from My mercy and beneficence,
